_header: Joseph and Mary maiden good / Had mickle marvel…
Note: For the ordinary text of this gospel see 5345 and 5613.
_description: Gospel, ‘Dominica infra octabas nativitatis’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Ioseph and mari maiden gudeHad mekill meruail in þaire mode…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …ffor wele þai wist whare þai gan wendeÞat he was noght þe childes frende
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Erant Ioseph & Maria & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica infra octobas natiuitatis cristi Euangelium secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 26va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.243-247.
